atlantic_arctic_ocean.description: The atlantic_arctic_ocean region comprises the entire geographic region covered by both the Atlantic and Arctic oceans.

indian_pacific_ocean.description: The indian_pacific_ocean region comprises the entire geographic region covered by both the Indian and Pacific oceans. This is distinct from the indo_pacific_ocean region.

indo_pacific_ocean.description: A biogeographic region of sea, comprising the tropical waters of the Indian Ocean, the tropical western and central Pacific Ocean, and the seas connecting the two around Indonesia. The indo_pacific_ocean region does not include the temperate and polar regions of the Indian and Pacific oceans, nor the tropical eastern Pacific. This is distinct from the indian_pacific_ocean region.
